name: Astral Terra
description: Explore, Adventure, Craft, Build, Survive. How will you shape your world? Astral Terra is a Smooth Voxel, Procedurally Generated Open World game with RPG and Survival Elements!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 64bit Processor: Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX550 ti/ATI 6770 or higher DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 64bit Processor: Quad Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 670/ATI 7870 or higher DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
